posts.title: What do you tell your kids when they ask about God?
posts.content: My kid asked me this the other day, and I didn't know what to say..

posts.title: The voice is an interesting thing
posts.content: What is it about my voice that is so appealing or is it that you think my voice is appealing because of how the media portrays it?

posts.title: To Trump and all his Trumpies..
posts.content:
Trump calls himself an 'ardent philanthropist,' but has not donated a dollar to The Donald J. Trump Foundation since 2006. He's not even the biggest donor to the foundation, having given about $3.7 million in the previous two decades while businesses associated with Vince McMahon’s World Wrestling Entertainment gave the Trump Foundation $5 million. All the money since 2006 has come from those doing business with him.
How does giving away other people’s money, in what could be seen as a kickback scheme, make him a philanthropist?

posts.title: To you nasty woman lovers..
posts.content: She's said it was a mistake to use a private email system while she was in the State Department, and has apologized for it. One of the issues that controversy raised is the question of the security of intra-government communication. With the hacking thats been occuring in recent days, what do you think about the dangers of Mrs.Clinton's carelessness?
